entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:25 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 4:49 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with freezing rain and ice pellets beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain at times mixed with ice pellets changing to rain near noon and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon then becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
